C

canMove(int, int, ArrayList<Entity>) - Method in class logic.entities.Enemy
The method checks if the object can move to the given coordinates without colliding with any ice entity in the array entities and without going outside the boundaries of the screen.
canMove(int, int, ArrayList<Entity>) - Method in class logic.entities.Entity
the function goes through the list of entities and if the x and y coordinates are equal to the coordinate it returns false and cannot move, otherwise if it is not in the same coordinates it returns the function withinBounds (x,y), which indicates that it can move.
canMove(int, int, ArrayList<Entity>) - Method in class logic.entities.IceCream
Checks if the entity can move to the specified position (x, y) without colliding with an IceBlock entity.
canMoveIndestructible(int, int, ArrayList<Entity>) - Method in class logic.entities.Enemy
The method checks if the object can move to the given coordinates without colliding with any indestructible obstacle entity in the array entities and without going outside the boundaries of the screen.
canMoveIndestructible(int, int, ArrayList<Entity>) - Method in class logic.entities.Entity
the function goes through the list of entities and if the x and y coordinates are equal to the coordinate it returns false and cannot move, otherwise if it is not in the same coordinates it returns the function withinBounds (x,y), which indicates that it can move.
canMoveIndestructible(int, int, ArrayList<Entity>) - Method in class logic.entities.IceCream
Checks if the IceCream entity can move to the specified position (x, y) without colliding with an IndestructibleBlock entity.
checkCollitions() - Method in class logic.Game
Checks collisions of entities in the game, particularly focusing on the main Player.
checkScore() - Method in class logic.Game
Checks the score of the game and adjusts the level accordingly.
